revised_title: The Absorption Spectra of Lithium and Cesium: A Study of Atomic Structure and Spectral Lines
tldr: This article presents the absorption spectra of lithium and cesium, providing a detailed analysis of their atomic structure and spectral lines. The author discusses the Rydberg formula and its application to these elements, as well as the differences in their absorption spectra compared to other alkali metals. The study contributes to the understanding of atomic structure and the behavior of spectral lines in various elements.
